 An Effect that simply sets the values of the relevant state variables. More...
class  StateActionModel
 Interface for objects that predict the dynamics of a given action at a given state. More...
class  StateActionModel::Observer
 Interface for objects that wish to be notified when a StateActionModel changes its estimation of its state-action's dynamics. More...
class  StatePolicy
 Interface for objects that specify an action (subtask) to execute at a given state. More...
class  StatePolicy::Observer
 Interface for objects that wish to be notified when a StatePolicy changes the action it selects. More...
class  Task
 Interface for an arbitrary task, which may either be a primitive action or an option-like temporal abstraction. More...

typedef boost::shared_ptr<AbsoluteEffect> AbsoluteEffectRef

Definition at line 49 of file action.hh.

typedef std::vector<EffectProbability> EffectDistribution

A probability distribution over effects.

The probabilities sum to 1. The contents of this data structure must be sorted (using the default comparator), and no two elements can have the same first part (Effect pointer).

Definition at line 47 of file action.hh.

typedef std::pair<EffectRef, double> EffectProbability

The probability of a certain effect, represented as a pointer.

The pointer must be non-NULL, and the probability must be nonnegative. Typically used as the value type in EffectDistribution.
